actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Reported to Senate by Senator Pell without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 136.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A bill to extend congratulations to the towns of Derby and Ansonia, Connecticut, on the occasion of the bicentennial of the appointment of David Humphreys as the United States' first Ambassador.

summary.text: Extends congratulations to the towns of Derby and Ansonia, Connecticut, on the occasion of the bicentennial of the appointment of David Humphreys as the United States' first Ambassador.

titles.title: A bill to extend congratulations to the towns of Derby and Ansonia, Connecticut, on the occasion of the bicentennial of the appointment of David Humphreys as the United States' first Ambassador.
